page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT & INDUSTRY BUILTH
page.content: Builth Wells is fortunate in that Powys has the lowest youth unemployment rate in Wales.However, these figures are distorted because of more school leavers joining the Youth Training scheme and various vocational courses.Even some farmers sons are now going on these courses. However,there are some modern suburban factories in our area which have had their 'ups and downs'. SATELITE TV ANTENNA SYSTEMS LTD,are a prosperous firm making prototype satelite TV receivers.They hope to go into full production in Winter 1985 and increase their 16 man workforce. In contrast to this a furniture factory(QUALICANE LTD)a few hundred yards away is owned by the owner of Saturn and was closed down in May 1985 with the loss of 50 jobs.
